section.heading: Forms Requiring Electronic Signature.
section.text: The filer shall include an electronic signature if one of the following forms is filed in an electronic format:

para.text: Affidavit filed in accordance with Election Law Article, §13-305, Annotated Code of Maryland;
Any other report, form, or document approved by the State Administrator to be filed in an electronic medium.

section.heading: Acceptance of Electronic Signature.
section.text: A filer shall use one of the following as the electronic signature of the filer:

para.text: The voter registration number of the person;
The driver's license number of the person;
The last four digits of the person's social security number;
Any State Board approved password generated by the person after registration of the campaign finance entity, independent expenditure entity, or electioneering communication entity; or
Any other personal identification information approved by the State Administrator.

annotations.annotation: Election Law Article, §§2-102(b)(4), 13-320, and 13-324, Annotated Code of Maryland
